Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Delegation 
   Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Federal Agency for Information Technology of Russia on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Aleksei Grigoriev, head of the delegation who is counselor of the agency.
